Public NotInheritable Class StopWordsRemoverTransform Inherits OneToOneTransformBase Implements IDataView, IStopWordsRemoverTransform
type StopWordsRemoverTransform = class inherit OneToOneTransformBase interface IStopWordsRemoverTransform interface IDataTransform interface IDataView interface ISchematized interface ICanSaveModel

Docs.summary: A Stopword remover transform based on language-specific lists of stop words (most common words) from Office Named Entity Recognition project. The transform is usually applied after tokenizing text, so it compares individual tokens (case-insensitive comparison) to the stopwords.
